social_work: Organizing Committee, IEEE MUJ Student Chapter

projects.name: Ease My Campus
projects.description: Created an Android Application to facilitate carpooling and leave management for Hostel Students. Designed the application UI in XML using Android Studio. Used Kotlin for backend development. Used firebase realtime database to perform CRUD operations and firebase authentication for user login and authentication.

projects.name: Health and Fitness Website
projects.description: Built a website for a health club to advertise its membership plans and manage memberships online. Front-end development using HTML, CSS and JAVASCRIPT. Used PHP for back-end development and MySQL for database.

projects.name: Keylogger
projects.description: Implemented an email sending keystroke capturer using Java. It is a spyware which captures all the keyboard inputs of the target and sends a mail to attacker. Used the jnativehook library and its functions and used the javax.mail package for facilitating mail transfer.

experiences.description: I was alloted a project in which I had to create data model for sales data from a csv file. Then I was tasked to load data into the tables from specified source while maintaining lineage, and carry out ETL and SCD implementation. Used SQL Server and SQL Server Management Studio.
